Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is RIGHT THERE and so good at finding objective issues. For instance in my computer science subjects, GenAI is so powerful when it comes to error checking code that it could take a TA 10 minutes to find. Though in my more subjective units AIs ideas about what will earn a good grade is less applicable than my TA who will be grading it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I don't think feedback from any source makes me feel very strongly. It's objective and not meant to make one feel happy/sad.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: It's very easy to fall into a trap of telling AI the submission guidelines are different to what they actually are to make it give you a better grade.
